name: USR Design System
description:
Usable. Simple. Responsible.

The design system for product teams at Bright.md.


Each component is assigned its own page.


Components are designed mobile first, 100% width ('fill-container') supporting a single-column layout.


For tablets (and larger) displays there are components with a '-tablet' suffix - these are for use in those designs where a two-column layout is desired.


Where possible variants have been used for related sets of icons, states, alternate layouts for a component, etc.


All element dimensions and properties are based on an 8-point grid. Style properties including font-size, line-height, padding, etc,. are multiples of 8, i.e., 8, 16, 24, 32, 40.


All color and text are assigned styles and have been tested with Design Lint (plugin). Design tokens are assigned to all style properties that support them with Figma Tokens (plugin).


Plugins used in this design system include:

  • Better File Thumbnails
  • Design Lint
  • Figma Tokens
